MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown following  reports of faulty electrical equipment on the underground cable newtwork and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:10pm on 30th March 2021.
